name: Millennium Electric Knee Chest Table
descr:
Chiroform has developed a first class serie of treatment- and examination equipment in co-operation with doctors, designer teams, engineers and the industry. The Chiroform Millennium equipment wears the global patent and trademark, and focus on both the patient and practitioner. New perspectives and options will open up with the Chiroform Millennium equipment.

The Chiroform Millennium Knee Chest Table. The unique anatomical shape and oval design makes both examination and treatment excellent, and at the same time the patient is safe and secured. The narrow design, user friendly headpiece with tilt and paper roll system gives optimum conditions for the practitioner, as well as easy and convenient for the patient. Handles and hand rest. Dual footswitches. Height adjustable legs.

Available in other fabrics and colours by request.

5 years of warranty on the frame. Upholstery 1 year of warranty.

Made 100% in Denmark.
